reviewtext: I'll summarize the performance in one word: delightful.If you need Gigabit speeds, search for a different product. Personally, I'm using these NetGear switches with Asoka PlugLink 9650s and I couldn't be much happier. A couple of these switches and a HomePlug system is sweet! Now, I'll just have to wait for HomePlug AV2 equipment with Gigabit speeds so I can buy newer, faster switches ... ;)
